Articles.Content:
KSP: 0.90, 64x (My computer can barely open KSP in 32x)

Problem: Craft file becomes corrupted in editor (Parts are unmovable, even after reload (if saved in that state)) and exit, load, launch, etc. buttons become unselectable.

Mods installed:

QuantumStruts

EditorExtentions

KerbinSide

Kerbtown

MechJeb2

RCSBuildAid

Trajectories

TweakableEverything

Kethane

ModuleManager

Mods are updated

Reproduction steps: Deattach a part, get it near the main craft. Undo.

Log: Here for full file

or

NullReferenceException
